channel.title: Duplicate identifier ' ' in script?
channel.description:
In one of my constants, i made it a text string. When i run the script, it says theres a duplicate identifier ' ' in the script. When i take out the ' ', it says unkown identifier ' ' in script. What is wrong?
and if you need more info, i made the const SetRun='N'; which is for the procedure RunAwayDIrection.

item.title: Duplicate identifier ' ' in script?

item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

yep i saw that and changed it whoops

Read full topic

item.title: Duplicate identifier ' ' in script?
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Shouldn’t

if(FindFight := true) then

Be: if(FindFight = true) then

?

Read full topic

item.title: Duplicate identifier ' ' in script?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Thats because BankColor is a variable, and you cannot have a const, and a variable with the same name…

Here, I fixed it:

[code]const
bonecolor=13158607; //Set your bone color.
progress=1; //Set how often progress report comes (minutes).
amtbones=0; //Set how many bones you want to withdraw at a time (0 is to withdraw all).
WhereToRun=‘S’; //Set where you want to run if attacked (N,E,S,W).
TheBankColor=5888755; //Set Bank $ symbol color (Color shold work, but color-pick anyways).

Procedure Randoms;
begin
BankColor:=TheBankColor;
if(FindFight :=true)then
RunAwayDirection(WhereToRun);
wait(4000+random(300));
ToBankers(BankColor,67,45);
end;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Duplicate identifier ' ' in script?
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

It still doesnt work. Ill put a piece of code here and see if anyone can see whats wrong.

[code]const
bonecolor=13158607; //Set your bone color.
progress=1; //Set how often progress report comes (minutes).
amtbones=0; //Set how many bones you want to withdraw at a time (0 is to withdraw all).
WhereToRun=‘S’; //Set where you want to run if attacked (N,E,S,W).
BankColor=5888755; //Set Bank $ symbol color (Color shold work, but color-pick anyways).

Procedure Randoms;
begin
if(FindFight :=true)then
RunAwayDirection(WhereToRun);
wait(4000+random(300));
ToBankers(BankColor,67,45);
end;[/code]

and thats the part of my script givin errors

Read full topic

item.title: Duplicate identifier ' ' in script?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Well SetRun is a procedure, so you cannot have that as a const.

SetRun(true); would make your player run.

If you want the user to set there RunAwayDirection, make a const like this:

[code]{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
const
RunWhichWay = ‘N’; //N,E,W,S (Which way you want to run if there is a random.)

begin
SetupSRL;
RunAwayDirection(RunWhichWay);
end.
[/code]

That will do it.

Also, lilshu, good job on trying to help! However := is only to declare variables as something, and he is using consts

Read full topic
